original: Edström, Mats Harald, civilingenjör, andre stadsarkitekt, Göteborg, f. 19/11/83 i Falköping av ’stat :insp. Ernst Reinhold E. o. Gertrud von Mosczins.ky. G. 14 m. Viola Marie-Louise Svanberg. Barn: Margot f. 15, Britta 17. — Genomg. CTI 98-06, avg:ex. från CTI 06, stud. v. FrKa t. 12. Ritare h. arkit. Y. Rasmussen 06-08, h. arkit. Arvid Bjerke 10-11, h. arkit. Sigge Cronstedt 10, prakt, arkit. II, anst. v. stadsing :kont. i Gbg 12, andre stadsarkit. i Gbg sed. 13. Sekr. i Tekn. ’samf. avd. f. husbyggn :konst 16-17, v. ordf. 18, ordf. i komm. f. om-arb. av byggn :ordn. i Gbg. Skr.: upps. i Tekn. samf. handl. RVO 43.
translated: Edström, Mats Harald, master of engineering, second city architect, Gothenburg, born on November 19th, 1883 in Falköping to 'state inspector' Ernst Reinhold E. and Gertrud von Mosczins.ky. Married for 14 years to Viola Marie-Louise Svanberg, they have two children: Margot born in 1915 and Britta in 1917. He completed his studies at CTI (Chalmers University of Technology) from 1898 to 1906, and received his graduation certificate in 1906. He studied at the Royal Academy of Fine Arts in Stockholm from 1906 to 1912. He worked as a drafter for architect Y. Rasmussen from 1906 to 1908, and worked for architect Arvid Bjerke from 1910 to 1911, as well as for architect Sigge Cronstedt in 1910. He was a practical architect II and employed at the city engineer's office in Gothenburg in 1912, and became the second city architect of Gothenburg after 1913. He was Secretary of the Technical Society Division for Building Construction Art from 1916 to 1917, Vice Chairman in 1918, and Chairman of the Committee for the Reorganization of Building Regulations in Gothenburg. He has written research papers in the Technical Society Proceedings and was awarded RVO 43.

memberOf.name: Technical Society Division for Building Construction Art
